newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Dah Bang 1996 net loss HK$28.21 mln.
newsitem.headline: Dah Bang 1996 net loss HK$28.21 mln.

text.p: NOTE - Dah Bang is a printing machinery distributor.

Net is after an exceptional loss of HK$20.88 million on provision for diminution in value of properties held for sale, loss of HK$3.06 million on provision for slow moving and obsolete stocks of printing and auxiliary machinery and spare parts, loss of HK$2.94 million on provision for doubtful debts.

The purchase of trading stocks for the year ended December 31, 1995 was understated by an amount of HK$6.39 million as a printing machine held on behalf of a customer was mistakenly delivered to another customer to satisfy another sale transaction entered for the same model of printing machine and no accrual of purchase and liability were made in the financial statements for the year ended December 31, 1995. The error has been corrected and adjusted as a prior period adjustment in the financial statements.
Total dividend for year is nil vs nil.
